general.title: They prefer us
general.description: Feel comfortable in Cartagena, we have the best spaces and we take care of every detail so you can enjoy your stay. With MFR Real Estate you can enjoy apartments for rent in the north of the city.

list.name: John F
list.comment: Everything was very good, just like in the photos, the cleaning was excellent and the requests that were made were all met! The apartment is recommended, the safe place and the best with direct access to the beach.

list.name: Daniel
list.comment: Excellent place to stay. In addition to being very well located, the apartment is perfectly adequate. Very comfortable, everything clean and the attention from the host is very good. Recommended!

list.name: Jenny
list.comment: It is a place to share with the family, rest, enjoy the view, the beach, the wet areas, the gym and the pool.

list.name: Diego Julian
list.comment: Excellent place, a very comfortable, spacious, well-equipped, clean apartment, excellent building facilities, gym, swimming pools, 24-hour security and access to the sea, as well as supermarkets, drugstores and restaurants nearby, highly recommended.

items.name: Diego Julian
items.comment: Excellent place, a very comfortable apartment, spacious, well equipped, clean, excellent building facilities, gym, swimming pools, 24 hour security and access to the sea, plus supermarkets, drugstores and restaurants nearby, highly recommended.

items.name: Yoni
items.comment: Excellent apartment, beautiful sight, the pool of my dreams and kid’s dream as well. Amazing location everything is close by!

items.name: Erick
items.comment: This place has a great location, nice view washer and dryer which is great. Host let me do a really late check out without any extra fees. Very attentive and responsive. Always willing to help.

items.name: Alejo
items.comment: The mafe apartment meets all the conditions to rest, equal to the photos and unbeatable location.

items.name: Michell
items.comment: The apartment is just as shown in the photos. It has everything you need to have a pleasant stay. The pool in the building and the access to the beach are perfect. Mafe is an excellent hostess, she was very attentive to everything we needed during our stay. I would definitely stay in this apartment again.

items.name: Camilo
items.comment: Great place and location! Everything was an easy process to check in. Really comfortable!.

items.name: Luz
items.comment: Excellent place, with all the amenities, very clean and nice, highly recommended, Mafe very attentive, thank you!.

items.name: Lady
items.comment: Highly recommended the apartment, Mafe very good hostess.

items.name: Andrés
items.comment: Very comfortable apartment in front of the sea, excellent security in the condominium, very good cleanliness, excellent common areas.

items.name: Vicmar
items.comment: Whenever I can it is my favorite place to stay in Cartagena!!!!!

items.name: Juliana
items.comment: Mafe was very attentive to our arrival and everything was excellent. I would come back and recommend it always.

items.name: Libardo
items.comment: Excellent, spacious, very well located, very comfortable. We highly recommend it.

items.name: Henry
items.comment: Very nice apartment and very well located.

items.name: Moritz
items.comment: Super nice apartment, super good communication, very clean and well equipped.

items.name: Felipe
items.comment: Excellent apartment.

items.name: Evan
items.comment: A great place in great location with a great host! You will have a great time if you book with Mafe! Note: apartment next to mafes unit was being worked on. The noise was noticeable during the day but didn’t effect my trip much. All in all great stay!.

items.name: Christian
items.comment: Very good space.

items.name: Luzma
items.comment: I felt very comfortable and had everything I needed. I loved the place, the pools, with direct access to the sea. Very quiet!.

items.name: Fernando José
items.comment: Excellent service... everything is as shown in the description, hot water (which is not found in other places), the perfect building, quick exit to the beach (literally the patio), excellent pool. In short, everything is perfect.

items.name: Jesus
items.comment: Mafe's apartment is amazing! super good location and totally worth the price. The communication and attention was good from the beginning and although we only stayed one night to rest everything was impeccable!.

items.name: Sergio
items.comment: Excellent place, unbeatable location.

items.name: Jorge
items.comment: Excellent place, clean, excellent location, excellent service and communication.

items.name: Lilia
items.comment: The place is very cozy, good location, very good cleanliness and good communication with Mafe. Recommended, we will be back for sure.

items.name: Raquel
items.comment: Nice apartment, very comfortable
